replies.body:
{{champion:112}} **Had enough yet Skarner? **

{{champion:72}} **I was going to say the same thing. You looked more beat up then me.**

{{champion:112}} **Looks like I will have to fixed your optic sensor when I take your body back with me.**

{{champion:72}} **Crystalline Exoskeleton!**

{{champion:112}} **Have you learned nothing yet? I will shield this. Siphon Power!**

{{champion:72}} **Not trying to break through the shield, just setting things up. Crystal Slash!, Fracture!, Crystal Slash!**

{{champion:112}} **You done yet? Now it my turn.**

{{champion:72}} **Yes I am done. And so are you.**

{{champion:112}} **What are you talking about? !? I...can't move. What is going on?**

{{champion:72}} **Crystallizing Sting. I injected enough of my crystal poison into you to prevent you from moving. Now....Crystal SLASH!!!!**

{{champion:112}} ***Got to move, got to move. move, move, MOVE!!!***

*Slash*

*Crack*

{{champion:72}} **!? The Shovel!!!**

{{champion:112}} **Oh this is got good. The shovel been broken in half. Without it, I can't control the ghouls**

{{champion:72}} **What going to happen with my race?**

{{champion:112}} **They are going to destroy everything. And I mean everything. No one and no thing is going to survive now. Not without a miracle that can stop them.**


*clack*

{{champion:72}} **? Is that....?**

{{champion:112}} **My Battlecast Xerath head? But why is it...oh no.**

{{champion:268}} Soo...looks like this Xerath was telling the truth for once. But now I have a question for it creator. What are you doing with my Shurima creatures?
You need a certain headmistress to proofread your work... {{champion:114}}
Sorry but I am not into spanking.
LOL
you spelled so many things wrong. but still I am so glad your making these you are a truly talented writer.
Trust me I am well aware of my terrible grammar. But as long as you are understanding the story, I am happy. :D
Since we're on the subject of grammar -- you're*
Well...that's a digital dagger in my back.

Xerath and Jayce were both last seen in the previous episode of this; now they are not there anymore due to the plot of the last episode and now they are on sale instead.

Awfully ironic...
It's almost as if I know what is going to be on sale.
you sneaky devil you. ;P
Dat Arcade Sona skin doe! {{champion:37}}
I personally prefer Silent Night!
Me to
same
I prefer the old Silent Night, before her recent skin downgrades.

That skin is so cruel yet I laugh everytime. Way to be punny, Rito.

Don't buy arcade sona , she's getting the ultimate skin confirmed as much bs as it sounds, you'll see it.
